roleset.name: style of dance
roleset.note: TANGO-V NOTES: Frames file for 'tango' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 51.5. (from tango.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: explicit mention of dance itself (rare), or path

example.name: as verb of motion
example.text: The administration and Congress have lately tangoed around the idea of sending military aid to Cambodia's non-communists.
example.arg: around the idea of sending military aid to Cambodia's non-communists
